pages.name: Hint #4
pages.text: With Midas's touch, the seeds take hold. A blooming fruit in shades of gold. Bake with care, and feast your eye, a golden glow within the pie.$(br)$(br)See the next page for the answer.

pages.title: Answer #4
pages.text: Craft or find golden pumpkin seeds, grow a golden pumpkin, and craft a golden pumpkin pie.

pages.title: Answer #4
pages.text: Golden pumpkin seeds are normally found in woodland mansions, this recipe allows you to craft them instead.$(br)
